name: Date
desc: The date of the transaction. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

name: Type
desc: The type of transaction, Either Buy or Sell

name: Cost_Basis
desc: The basis of the cost, found to the right of the price

name: Proceeds
desc: The proceeds of the cost, found to the right of Cost Basis

name: Gain_Loss
desc: The gain or loss amount found to the right of Proceeds
